generated_body: In reading about Deval Patrick's anticipated entry into the 2020 presidential race, the user may expect a detailed overview of his political background and objectives. The article is likely to discuss Patrick's previous role as the Governor of Massachusetts, highlighting key policies and initiatives he championed during his tenure. The piece could also touch on his appeal to various voter demographics and any significant endorsements he may seek.
